```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    head = df.head()
    chart = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
      alt.X('Random Numbers', bin=True),
      y='count()'
    )
    print(df.head())
    return [head, chart]

result = preview_data(data)
result[1].display()

```
